meanings.definition: Absolute lack of moderation or qualification.
meanings.sent1: The unmitigatedness of his anger was evident in his loud shouting.
meanings.sent2: The unmitigatedness of the storm caused widespread damage.
meanings.sent3: The unmitigatedness of her laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: The unmitigatedness of the sun's heat made everyone seek shade.
meanings.sent5: The unmitigatedness of the waterfall's roar was deafening.
